sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均表示"灾难"或"不幸"之意。
means: disaster ： 普通用词，指大破坏、痛苦或伤亡。
calamity ： 多指个人的不幸，比disaster严重，强调灾难引起的悲痛以及对于损失的感觉。
catastrophe ： 语气最强，指可怕的灾难，强调最终的结局。
misfortune ： 普通用词，多批较为严重的不幸，强调不幸多由外界因素所致。

sentence.Network_en: He described drugs as the greatest calamity of the age.
sentence.Network_cn: 他称毒品是这个时代最大的祸害。

sentence.Network_en: The frost last week was a great calamity to the citrus industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 上周的霜冻对柑橘种植业是一场大灾难.

sentence.Network_en: The marriage proved to be the greatest calamity of his life.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实证明这桩婚姻是他一生中最大的不幸.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'disaster and distress'): from Old French calamite, from Latin calamitas

entry.def: A calamity is an event that causes a great deal of damage, destruction, or personal distress.

example.ex: He described drugs as the greatest calamity of the age...
example.tran: 他称毒品是这个时代最大的祸害。

means.word_mean: 1. an event resulting in great loss and misfortune;

sentences.sentence: "the whole city was affected by the irremediable calamity"

auth_sentence.content: No calamity which right words will not begin to redress.
auth_sentence.res_content: No calamity which right words will not begin to redress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No calamity which right words will not begin to redress.

auth_sentence.content: Help make sure this type of calamity never happens again.
auth_sentence.res_content: Help make sure this type of calamity never happens again.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Help make sure this type of calamity never happens again.

auth_sentence.content: Melting those soils is an ongoing climate calamity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Melting those soils is an ongoing climate calamity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Melting those soils is an ongoing climate calamity.

sentences.en: If we had been careful such a calamity would not have befallen us.
sentences.cn: 假如我们谨慎的话, 这种灾难不会降临到我们的头上。

sentences.en: The marriage proved to be the greatest calamity of his life.
sentences.cn: 事实证明这桩婚姻是他一生中最大的不幸。

jushi.english: It will be a calamity if I fail my exam.
jushi.chinese: 这次考试如果通不过我就惨了。

jushi.english: They kept a record of earthquake calamity.
jushi.chinese: 他们记录地震所发生的灾祸。
